Revolutionize your data

Our Mission:

To co-design innovative data technology with service-delivery staff on the frontline. We believe equipping staff with effective data-technology creates a more informed, better served, public.

If your organization is looking to inform front-line, organizational, and public decisions with actionable data, our customized data tools are for you.

Featuring:
Intuitive Interfaces

Credible data starts at the frontline. Empower your organization with friendly interfaces made-to-order. Our tools are made to fit your existing processes on any device.

Interactive Reports

TRY ME

Data unseen is data unused. Our interactive reports allow you to retrieve funder requirements in minutes, freeing time for more nuanced analysis.

Prices that don't require profits

Our projects are priced with your needs in mind. We provide innovation at a flat monthly fee and leave the absurd implementation fees to the capitalists. We work in the Microsoft ecosystem; all licences are heavily discounted (60% or more) for non-profits.
